# Xmldoc Docs

## XML documentation comments

- [Generate API documentation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/language-reference/xmldoc/index.md): Learn about documentation comments. You can create documentation for your code by including XML elements in special comment fields. You can use other tools to build documentation layouts from comments.
- [Recommended tags](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/language-reference/xmldoc/recommended-tags.md): This article provides the syntax and definitions for recommended tags on types, and their members for XML documentation.
- [Examples](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/language-reference/xmldoc/examples.md): See documentation examples on many different C# language elements. Learn which tags to use in different situations and for different language elements.
